commands.name: link-root
commands.summary: Copy node_modules to root (for prod website only)
commands.description: react-static errors in production mode if it doesn't find a root node_modules, this is a workaround for now

commands.name: unlink-root
commands.description: After finishing production website work you need to unlink the root node_modules

commands.name: prune-node-modules
commands.description: Prune common/temp/node_modules/@neo-one of all @neo-one packages (except ec-key) that are pulled down from NPM for @neotracker/core. Used before building the NEO•ONE website

commands.name: compile-workers-dev
commands.description: Compile the NEO•ONE website workers

commands.name: compile-overlay-dev
commands.description: Compile the NEO•ONE website overlay

commands.name: compile-test-runner-dev
commands.description: Compile the NEO•ONE test-runner [dev]

commands.name: compile-preview-dev
commands.description: Compile the NEO•ONE editor preview

commands.name: serve-server
commands.summary: Compile & serve editor server (only in dev mode)
commands.description: Build and run the NEO•ONE editor server
commands.shellCommand: mkdir -p ./dist/server && touch ./dist/server/index.js && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=3072" node ./packages/neo-one-build-tools-web/dist/compile --watch --bundle server

commands.name: serve-static-dev
commands.description: Build and serve NEO•ONE website with React Static [dev]

commands.name: compile-website-dev
commands.description: Compile the workers and overlay bundles [dev]

commands.name: run-website-dev
commands.summary: Run website in dev mode (run compile-website-dev first)
commands.description: Run the entire NEO•ONE website [dev]

commands.name: compile-workers-prod
commands.description: Compile the NEO•ONE website workers
commands.shellCommand: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=3072" node ./packages/neo-one-build-tools-web/dist/compile --bundle workers

commands.name: compile-overlay-prod
commands.description: Compile the NEO•ONE website overlay
commands.shellCommand: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=3072" node ./packages/neo-one-build-tools-web/dist/compile --bundle overlay

commands.name: serve-preview-prod
commands.description: Compile and serve the NEO•ONE editor preview [prod]
commands.shellCommand: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=3072" node ./packages/neo-one-build-tools-web/dist/compile --bundle preview && serve dist/preview -p 8080

commands.name: serve-test-runner-prod
commands.description: Compile and serve the NEO•ONE test-runner [prod]
commands.shellCommand: cross-env NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NEO_ONE_PROD=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=3072" node ./packages/neo-one-build-tools-web/dist/compile --bundle testRunner && serve dist/testRunner -p 8081

commands.name: serve-static-prod
commands.summary: Build and serve static with React Static and serve pkg
commands.description: Build and serve NEO•ONE website with React Static and serve pkg
commands.shellCommand: rm -rf ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cp -r ./dist/workers ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cp -r ./packages/neo-one-website/public/* ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cross-env NEO_ONE_STAGING=true NEO_ONE_CACHE=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=6144" TS_NODE_PROJECT=./packages/neo-one-build-tools/includes/build-configs/tsconfig.es2017.cjs.json react-static build --staging --config ./packages/neo-one-website/static.config.js && serve ./packages/neo-one-website/dist -p 3000

commands.name: compile-website-prod
commands.description: Compile the workers and overlay bundles [prod]

commands.name: run-website-prod
commands.summary: Run entire website in prod (run compile-website-prod & link-root before, run unlink-root when done)
commands.description: Run the entire NEO•ONE website [prod]

commands.name: compile-all-live
commands.summary: Only compile all website pieces for live deployment to NOW
commands.description: Compile all website pieces and do nothing else
commands.shellCommand: rm -rf ./dist && rm -rf ./packages/neo-one-website/dist && rush compile-website-prod && node ./packages/neo-one-build-tools-web/dist/compile --bundle testRunner && node ./packages/neo-one-build-tools-web/dist/compile --bundle server && node ./packages/neo-one-build-tools-web/dist/compile --bundle preview && rm -rf ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cp -r ./dist/workers ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cp -r ./packages/neo-one-website/public/* ./packages/neo-one-website/publicOut && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=6144" TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig/tsconfig.es2017.cjs.json yarn run react-static build && sh ./scripts/rm-cruft

commands.name: deploy-all-live
commands.summary: Deploy all website pieces to NOW (run compile-all-live first)
commands.description: Deploy static, test-runner, preview, and server each to NOW
commands.shellCommand: rush compile-all-live && rush deploy-static-live && rush deploy-test-runner-live && rush deploy-preview-live && rush deploy-server-live
